comparison.description: How to compare the item's harvest level to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How to compare the item's harvest level to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value to compare the item's harvest level to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value to compare the item's harvest level to.

type.description:
## Harvest Level

---



[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/harvest_level)

Checks whether the material of the item has a certain harvest level value. Refer to [Minecraft Wiki: Tiers](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/harvest_level) for the harvest level of the materials (there it's called "mining level"). Items without a material are considered to have a harvest level of 0.

Type ID: `origins:harvest_level`




---

### Examples

```json
"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:harvest_level",
    "comparison": ">",
    "compare_to": 1
}
```

This example checks if the item has a harvest level higher than 1, which is the value for stone tools.
